short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ezyly Capture full screen of application screen on any HTTPs domain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This will help you to Share the Screen whenever you are running a Webinar through EzyWebinarPro (EzyMarketer).

It will also ask you that which Window you want to share or which Application you want to share.
